QuestData.Title: Crab Fishin'
QuestData.Description: Perhaps me agin' body is just growin' too picky after all dese years, but boar meat just ain't goin' down easy no more. More for da new recruits I be thinkin'.$B$BWe just set out some crab traps, but if ya be willin' ta help an impatient old troll, I'd love ta have some fresh crawler meat right now. Dey're all around da island, but da best spot ta be huntin' them is off da eastern coast.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill Pygmy Surf Crawlers and collect 5 Fresh Crawler Meat.
QuestData.CompletionText: Da sea be offerin' few boons as delicious as fresh crawler meat.
QuestData.RewardText: Oi! Tasty, mon. Thank ya for your great kindness, young one. Da spirits shall surely be regardin' ya with great favor.
